content.rendered:
Prof A.R.K.Raju
CEO, BREDS Over 25 years of experience in the development sector and promoted various MACS (Mutually Aided Credit Cooperative Societies) in north coastal Andhra Pradesh and has extensive experience in the field of microfinance. Mr. Raju is also a visiting faculty at CSREM, a B-School based out of Orissa.

Mobile +91 93473 46900 | Email Id: arkraju64@gmail.com

 

Venkat Sivanand Kumar
Managing Director of Gram Tarang Inclusive Development Services holds B.Com (Bachelors of Commerce) degree from Osmania University and management degree from Xavier Institute of Management, Bhubaneswar. Possess Two years experience with Agribusiness Group at ICICI Bank and 15 months with Intellecap, a development consulting company. Started a microfinance consultancy in 2009 and worked with tier 2 and tier 3 MFIs especially from A.P, Orissa, Karnataka. Area of expertise includes Retail Banking, Ratings, Microfinance Institution Loan Portfolio Audits, Microfinance Institution Development, Business Planning, Financial Modeling & Investment Banking.

Mobile +91 7382092355 | Email Id: venkat@gramtarang.org
